edu.rit.image.png

Class Compressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.image.png.Compressor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    fdATCompressor, IDATCompressor

    public abstract class Compressor
extends Object
    Class Compressor is the abstract base class for an object that compresses a sequence of bytes into PNG chunks and writes the chunks to a ChunkOutput object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Compressor(ChunkOutput chunkOutput, int seqnum)
      Construct a new compressor that will write to the given underlying chunk output object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int nextSequenceNumber()
      Returns the next chunk sequence number to be used.
      void write(byte[] b, boolean finish)
      Write the given byte array to this compressor.
      void write(int b, boolean finish)
      Write the given byte to this compressor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Compressor

        public Compressor(ChunkOutput chunkOutput,
          int seqnum)
        Construct a new compressor that will write to the given underlying chunk output object.
        Parameters:
        chunkOutput - Chunk output object.
        seqnum - Initial chunk sequence number.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if chunkOutput is null.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(int b,
         boolean finish)
           throws IOException
        Write the given byte to this compressor.
        Parameters:
        b - Byte. Only the least significant 8 bits are used.
        finish - True if this is the last data to be compressed, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred.

      • write

        public void write(byte[] b,
         boolean finish)
           throws IOException
        Write the given byte array to this compressor.
        Parameters:
        b - Byte array.
        finish - True if this is the last data to be compressed, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred.

        Returns the next chunk sequence number to be used.
